      • testMoodSpinner

        public void testMoodSpinner()
        Multiple options are selected to make sure that the spinner returns the correct values. Cycles through each option. As more emotions are added, more assertions will be required to test those emotions. The activity should also be CreateMoodActivity
        See Also:
        CreateMoodActivity, Mood

      • testSocialSettingSpinner

        public void testSocialSettingSpinner()
        Similar to the mood spinner, the test cycles through the available options to ensure proper functionality (ie. obtaining the right social setting). We will first need to ensure we are at the proper activity (CreateMoodActivity)
        See Also:
        CreateMoodActivity, SocialSetting

      • testTriggerEditText

        public void testTriggerEditText()
        Test the functionality of the trigger EditText to ensure proper input.

      • testPhotoImageView

        public void testPhotoImageView()
        Test to determine that the bitmap view is displaying the correct image that the participant intends on viewing, after getting the image from the file.

      • testCreateButton

        public void testCreateButton()
        Test the createMoodEvent button to ensure that when you click on the button, you will be sent to the MyProfileActivity upon completion. If it does not createMoodEvent the mood properly, then either the app will crash or you will not be sent to the MyProfileActivity.
        See Also:
        MyProfileActivity
